paragraphs.content: A Song of degrees for Solomon.
paragraphs.contentHtml: A Song of degrees for Solomon.

paragraphs.content: Except the LORD build the house, they labour in vain that build it: except the LORD keep the city, the watchman waketh but in vain.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Except the Lord build the house, they labour in vain that build it: except the Lord keep the city, the watchman waketh but in vain.

paragraphs.content: It is vain for you to rise up early, to sit up late, to eat the bread of sorrows: for so he giveth his beloved sleep.
paragraphs.contentHtml: It is vain for you to rise up early, to sit up late, to eat the bread of sorrows: for so he giveth his beloved sleep.

paragraphs.content: Lo, children are an heritage of the LORD: and the fruit of the womb is his reward.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Lo, children are an heritage of the Lord: and the fruit of the womb is his reward.

paragraphs.content: As arrows are in the hand of a mighty man; so are children of the youth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: As arrows are in the hand of a mighty man; so are children of the youth.

paragraphs.content: Happy is the man that hath his quiver full of them: they shall not be ashamed, but they shall speak with the enemies in the gate.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Happy is the man that hath his quiver full of them: they shall not be ashamed, but they shall speak with the enemies in the gate.
